item.title: AN EXCLUSIVE INTERVIEW ft. Harold Jonker [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch [INTERVIEWS] ~ May 12, 2023
On this episode of the Dispatch, host Andrew DeBartolo sits down for an exclusive interview with trucker, business owner, father, and former Niagara Area Councillor Harold Jonker to discuss the four criminal charges brought against him for his involvement in the Freedom Convoy fifteen months afterward, and what the Convoy meant to him and his loved ones.

SUPPORT FOR HAROLD JONKER'S DEFENCE FUND: https://givesendgo.com/TruckersLegalSupport?utm_source=sharelink&utm_medium=copy_link&utm_campaign=TruckersLegalSupport; EMAIL: helpforharoldjonker@gmail.com.

 

Support Josh's Stand and Help Us Defend His Liberties! Sign Our Petition Here: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/i-stand-with-josh-alexander/.

item.title: The REAL Long COVID is State Tyranny & the Censorious CRTC Looks to Ban FOX News [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ May 11, 2023
On this episode of the Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matty examine the coronation of the newly crowned King Charles III, the Christian nature of the religious ceremony, and how Canadian Progressives seek to erase, replace, and destroy Canada's Christian Heritage.

[Segment 1] - CRTC considers banning Fox News from cable packages:
Open Letter to the CRTC on FOX NEWS | Egale Canada: https://egale.ca/awareness/open-letter-crtc-fox-news; 
CRTC Considering FOX News Ban | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/politics/crtc-ban-fox-news-canadian-cable; 
Public Comments on Egale CRTC Complaint | CRTC: https://applications.crtc.gc.ca/CommentForm/Default-Defaut.aspx?lang=e&EN=202302108&ET=A&S=O&PA=A&PT=A&PST=A&FN=;

[Segment 2] - Who says COVID is over? Canada says it is still here FOREVER:
WHO experts revise Covid-19 vaccine advice, say healthy kids and teens low risk | CNN: https://www.cnn.com/2023/03/29/health/who-updates-covid-vaccine-recommendations-intl-hnk/index.html;
Covid global health emergency is over, WHO says | BBC: https://www.bbc.com/news/health-65499929;
COVID-19 is still with us even as WHO says it is no longer a global emergency: Duclos | CP24: https://www.cp24.com/news/covid-19-is-still-with-us-even-as-who-says-it-is-no-longer-a-global-emergency-duclos-1.6386438?cache=;

[Segment 3] - Liberal Government appears to push jab mandates:
Trudeau attacks Poilievre in speech at Liberal convention | CTV NEWS: https://www.youtube.com/embed/p_egdwPrWtA
Mandatory Vaccination | Liberal Party of Canada: https://liberal.ca/our-platform/mandatory-vaccination;
Leaked vaccine call with Liberal MP: https://twitter.com/OdessaOrlewicz/status/1655661392387768320?s=20;

item.title: The KING of THE GREAT RESET...and the Intentional Erasure of Canadaâ€™s Christian History [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ May 09, 2023
On this episode of the Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matty examine the coronation of the newly crowned King Charles III, the Christian nature of the religious ceremony, and how Canadian Progressives seek to erase, replace, and destroy Canada's Christian Heritage.

Canada’s Christian Heritage ft. CHP’s Ken Stouffer - MUST WATCH!: https://rumble.com/v2k785a-canadas-christian-heritage-ft.-chps-ken-stouffer.html;

[Segment 1] -  King Charles III of the Great Reset, Lord of the Climate Cult:
Coronation Oath of King Charles | Toronto Star: https://www.thestar.com/news/world/royals/2023/05/06/oath-full-text-coronation-king-charles.html;
"Coronation of the British Monarch": https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coronation_of_the_British_monarch; 
THE GREAT RE:SET: https://www.youtube.com/embed/hRPQqfwwuhU;
Klaus Schwab and Prince Charles on why we need a Great Reset | WEF: https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2020/06/the-great-reset-this-weeks-world-vs-virus-podcast; 
King Charles on The Great Reset | Twitter: https://twitter.com/SovMichael/status/1655557785868697600;

[Segment 2] - A NEW Crown for Canada and stripping away Christian symbolism:

King Charles No-Longer Defender of the Faith | CBC NEWS: https://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/king-charles-defender-of-the-faith-coronation-1.6832670;
Canada strips religious symbols from crown on coat-of-arms | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/opinion/canada-strips-religious-symbols-from-crown-on-coat-of-arms;
Religious Symbolism of Fluers-de-lis: https://www.familysearch.org/en/blog/fleur-de-lis-symbolism-and-meaning;
Canadian Heritage Dept. Labels Canadian Museums are Evil Colonial Institutions | The Post Millenial: https://thepostmillennial.com/canadian-museums-are-colonial-institutions-according-to-trudeau-liberals-heritage-dept;
Renewal of Museum Policy | Government of Canada: https://www.canada.ca/en/canadian-heritage/campaigns/renewal-museum-policy/guidelines.html;

[Segment 3] - Teaching Children to Hate Canadian History & Waterloo trustee makes anti-Christian, sexist, racist claims and plays the coward when confronted:
TRIGGER WARNING: The Coronation!?!?! | Life Site News: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/catholic-school-board-advises-staff-on-impacts-of-colonization-ahead-of-king-charles-iii-coronation;
CLC Urges Canadians to Protest Anti-Christian, Sexist, Bigoted Catholic School Coard Trustee | Life Site News: https://www.lifesitenews.com/opinion/pro-family-group-urges-canadians-to-protest-racist-anti-christian-catholic-school-trustee;
Catholic School Board Trustees Display Astonishing Cowardice at Meeting | Life Site News: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/watch-catholic-school-trustees-flee-board-meeting-after-parents-question-anti-christian-tweets;
Ontario School Board Backs Sexist, Racist, Christophobic Trustee | The Post Millenial: https://thepostmillennial.com/ontario-school-board-backs-trustee-who-said-white-christian-males-are-the-most-dangerous-creature-on-the-planet?utm_content=;

item.title: DOMINION PODCAST CROSSOVER: Faithfully Confronting the Hypocrisy of Canada's Evangelical Elites [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch [INTERVIEWS] ~ May 05, 2023
On this episode of the Dispatch, hosts Andrew DeBartolo and Matthew Hallick are by the co-hosts of the Dominion Podcast, Pastor Alex Kloosterman and Jeremy Boyd, to talk about their recent response to the rank hypocrisy of the evangelical elites and their gaslighting as displayed in a recent The Gospel Coalition  (TGC) Canada podcast surrounding the COVID-19 pandemic and the various church responses. You're not going to want to miss this spicy one! 

Episode Resources: Canadian Pastor's Forum: COVID-19 | TGC  Canada: https://ca.thegospelcoalition.org/tgc-canada/canadian-pastors-forum-covid-19/; Dominion Podcast Response to TGC Podcast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oe_obzH9S-c&t=986s; Dominion Press Substack:  https://dominionpress.substack.com/; An Open Letter to the Churches of Canada by Alex Kloosterman & Ben Inglis: https://dominionpress.substack.com/p/an-open-letter-to-the-churches-of;

item.title: STATIST MEDICAL EMPIRE STRIKES BACK: Covidiocy Has NOT Gone Away! [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ May 04, 2023
On this episode of the Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matty look at the continued fallout from our Evil Empire's response to COVID-19. 

[Segment 1] -  The Empire punishes the rebels long after COVID:
WATCH: Ontario township councillor charged for participating in Freedom Convoy, 15 months later | Western Standard: https://www.westernstandard.news/news/watch-ontario-township-councillor-charged-for-participating-in-freedom-convoy-15-months-later/article_bfefa648-e910-11ed-9d77-bf4d03f2c264.html; 
Ontario doctors give up licences after complaints over COVID vaccine exemptions, misinformation | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/canada/doctors-resign-licences-covid-19-vaccine-exemptions-misinformation#Echobox=1681838713;
Ontario Court Rules Patients’ Medical Records Not Private During Doctor Investigations | Bright Light News: https://brightlightnews.com/ontario-court-rules-patients-medical-records-not-private-during-doctor-investigations;

[Segment 2] - Evil Empire's laws that hurt everyone:
Groups pushing the shot we quietly funded by Pfizer | Reclaim the Net: https://reclaimthenet.org/groups-pushing-vaccine-passports-mandates-were-quietly-funded-by-pfizer;
Recipient Name Program / Project Description Payment Amount (USD) US Medical, Scientific, Patient and Civic Organization Funding Report | Pfizer: https://www.documentcloud.org/documents/23787007-pfizer-2021-report;

MUST WATCH!: https://rumble.com/v246yo4-deanna-mcleod-pt.-3-vaccine-conflicts-of-interest.html
 
Mixed Martial Arts and UFC fighters are collapsing and dying suddenly - some of these deaths are very suspicious | MAKIS MD: https://makismd.substack.com/p/mixed-martial-arts-and-ufc-fighters?publication_id=1385328&post_id=111943247&isFreemail=true; 
Explosive New Study Finds Face Masks May Increase Stillbirths, Testicular Dysfunction, Cognitive Decline IN KIDS | Summit News: https://summit.news/2023/04/24/explosive-new-study-finds-face-masks-may-increase-stillbirths-testicular-dysfunction-cognitive-decline-in-kids; 
Possible toxicity of chronic carbon dioxide exposure associated with face mask use, particularly in pregnant women, children and adolescents – A scoping review | Helyion: https://www.cell.com/heliyon/pdf/S2405-8440(23)01324-5.pdf; 

[Segment 3] - MAILBAG QUESTIONS:
If you want your question featured on the show, message mailbag@libertycoalitioncanada.com;

Suggested Resources: The Ruler of Kings by Joseph Boot: https://ezrapress.ca/products/ruler-of-kings-toward-a-christian-vision-of-government; Roots of Western Culture by Herman Dooyeweerd: https://www.amazon.com/Roots-Western-Culture-Herman-Dooyeweerd/dp/0888152213; Revelation: Four Views - A parallel commentary: https://www.amazon.com/Revelation-Parallel-Commentary-Revised-Updated/dp/1401676219/ref=sr_1_1?crid=L9BWQ65OVFIR&keywords=revelation+4+views%27&qid=1683234405&s=books&sprefix=revelation+4+views%27%2Cstripbooks-intl-ship%2C103&sr=1-1.
